message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this unique opportunity to acquire a valuable product. I believe it has the potential to bring significant benefits to your business. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1500000. This is a one-time offer, and I'm confident you won't find a better deal elsewhere.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $900000. This is a fair price considering the product's potential benefits to my business.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I'm not willing to go as low as $900000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $1200000. This is a competitive price considering the product's value and potential benefits to your business.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to pay $950000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value and potential benefits to my business.

Thank you for your revised offer, Bob. I understand your concerns about the price, but I'm still not willing to go as low as $950000. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer it to you for $1100000. This is the lowest price I'm willing to accept, considering the product's value and potential benefits to your business.

I appreciate your willingness to make another concession, but $1100000 is still too high for me. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $1050000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value and potential benefits to my business.

I understand your persistence, Bob, and I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway. However, I'm still not willing to go as low as $1050000. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer it to you for $1075000. This is the lowest price I'm willing to accept, considering the product's value and potential benefits to your business.

I appreciate your willingness to make another concession, but I'm still not comfortable with $1075000. I'm willing to go up to $1025000, but that's as high as I'm willing to go. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value and potential benefits to my business.

I understand your position, Bob, and I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway. However, I'm still not willing to go as low as $1025000. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer it to you for $1050000. This is the lowest price I'm willing to accept, considering the product's value and potential benefits to your business.
